i own a dog that is small.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
I enjoy peaceful sports and my bike rides are relaxing.

content.text: Hi! I'm a Game of Thrones fan. What's your favorite TV show?
I love Game of Thrones too! I'm also a huge fan of The Walking Dead.
I haven't seen The Walking Dead yet, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really good show. It's a little scary, but it's really good.
I'm not usually a fan of scary shows, but I'll give it a try.
I'm sure you'll like it! What do you do for fun?
I like to go on bike rides, play video games, and read.
I like to go on bike rides too! I also like to play video games and read.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite genre is probably action-adventure games.
I like action-adventure games too! I'm playing through The Last of Us right now.
The Last of Us is a great game! I really enjoyed it.
Me too! I'm excited to see what happens in the sequel.
I'm excited for the sequel too! I hope it's as good as the first one.
